name: d2l-table-hockey-tracker
description: Track and display results for D2L Winnipeg table hockey games

scripts.prebuild: rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && mkdirp ./dist/api && mkdirp ./dist/lib && mkdirp ./dist/views && mkdirp ./dist/static && cp ./src/views/* ./dist/views/ && cp ./src/app-server.js ./dist/app-server.js && cp ./src/api/* ./dist/api/ && cp ./src/lib/* ./dist/lib/
scripts.build:client: browserify src/app-client.js -o dist/static/app-client.js && node-sass src/app-client.scss dist/static/app-client.css
scripts.start: npm run start:build && npm run start:execute
scripts.startLocal: npm run start:build && npm run start:executeLocal

author: Dave Harris
